mapper.select: SELECT F.* FROM SYS_FUNCTION F WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION RF INNER JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE UR ON UR.ROLE_ID = RF.ROLE_ID WHERE UR.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND RF.FUNCTION_ID = F.FUNCTION_ID ) ORDER BY F.FUNCTION_LEVEL, F.FUNCTION_ORDER

SELECT F.* FROM SYS_FUNCTION F WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION RF INNER JOIN SYS_USER_ROLE UR ON UR.ROLE_ID = RF.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN SYS_ROLE R ON R.ROLE_ID = UR.ROLE_ID AND R.IS_VALID = 'Y' WHERE UR.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND RF.FUNCTION_ID = F.FUNCTION_ID ) ORDER BY F.FUNCTION_LEVEL, F.FUNCTION_ORDER
SELECT F.* FROM SYS_FUNCTION F INNER JOIN SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION RF ON RF.FUNCTION_ID = F.FUNCTION_ID WHERE RF.ROLE_ID = #{roleId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY F.FUNCTION_LEVEL, F.FUNCTION_ORDER
SELECT PF.* FROM SYS_FUNCTION PF INNER JOIN SYS_FUNCTION SF ON SF.PARENT_FUNCTION_ID = PF.FUNCTION_ID WHERE SF.FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT FUNCTION_ID, FUNCTION_CODE, FUNCTION_NAME, PARENT_FUNCTION_ID, FUNCTION_LEVEL, FUNCTION_URL, FUNCTION_ORDER, IS_MENU, IS_VALID, ACCESS_TYPE, ICON_CLASS, MEMO, INST_USER, INST_DATETIME, LUPD_USER, LUPD_DATETIME FROM SYS_FUNCTION

SELECT F.* , (select U.user_name from sys_user U where u.user_id = F.inst_user) instUserName, (select U.user_name from sys_user U where u.user_id = F.lupd_user) lupdUserName FROM SYS_FUNCTION F
AND F.FUNCTION_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{functionCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND F.FUNCTION_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{functionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') AND F.FUNCTION_URL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{functionUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
